resources.string: Begin protecting your creations right now!

1. Click Encrypt > Open Tab Editor. 
 2. Complete tab: 1st field - E High; 6th field - E Low.
 Warning: Max tab fret is 21st fret. 
 3. The bottom field is Key Field. Record the key.
 4. Click Save and Exit.
 5. Show to watch the cipher and Copy to copy the Show Field.
 6. Click on Decrypt button.
 7. In field Insert your message you must insert your cipher.
 8. In field Insert your key you must insert your key.
 9. Click Decrypt.

----
 Cryptabs
 Salikova Mariia, Voronezh 2020
 All rights received
